member.name: T:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper
member.summary: 处理常规的密码操作，包括：加密/解密/散列/散列验证操作

list.item: 采用标准DES算法进行基于固定密钥的加密/解密处理
采用标准SHA1算法计算散列

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.#cctor
member.remarks: 无参数的构造函数，用默认的方式初始化各个属性。

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.CreateHash(System.Byte[])
member.overrides: Computes the hash value of plain text using the given hash provider instance
member.summary: Computes the hash value of plain text using the given hash provider instance
member.param: The input for which to compute the hash.

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.CreateHash(System.String)
member.summary: 为纯文本字符串计算哈希值
member.param: 需要计算哈希值的纯文本字符串
member.remarks: 为纯文本字符串计算哈希值。

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.HashCheck(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.overrides: Compares plain text input with a computed hash using the given hash provider instance.
member.summary: Compares plain text input with a computed hash using the given hash provider instance.
member.remarks: Use this method to compare hash values. Since hashes may contain a random "salt" value, two seperately generated hashes of the same plain text may result in different values.
member.param: The input for which you want to compare the hash to.
The hash value for which you want to compare the input to.
member.returns: true if plainText hashed is equal to the hashedText. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.HashCheck(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 比较由纯文本串计算出的哈希值与给定的哈希值是否一致。
member.param: 输入需要进行哈希比较的字符串
member.returns: true 如果纯文本哈希值与给定的哈希值相等，否则返回false.
member.remarks: 运用这个方法来比较由纯文本串计算的哈希值和给定的哈希值是否一致。

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.Decrypt(System.String)
member.remarks: 对字符串的解密处理

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Accessories.CryptoHelper.Encrypt(System.String)
member.remarks: 对字符串的加密处理

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.Database.BuildParameterName(System.String)
member.summary:
根据数据库类型提供指定的参数名称
为了真正做到数据库无关，建议所有参数名称均通过该方法进行参数名称匹配。 例如存储过程参数entryId, 在Oracle中采用entryId，而在SQL Server中采用@entryId
member.returns: 根据不同数据库命名规则处理后的参数名称

member.name: T:MCS.Library.Data.DbContext
member.summary:
Generic database processing context.
this context is attatch to current HttpContext(web app) or Thread CurrentContext property.
the primary goal is to harmonize the Transaction management in a call stack.
itself could be disposed automatically.

member.summary:
Private const

member.summary:
Private const
the context key name postfix that doesn't exists in transaction.

member.summary: Internal connection object for non-transactional context

member.summary: Internal transaction object for non-transactional context

member.summary: Whether exists a transaction in constructor

member.name: F:MCS.Library.Data.DeluxeDbContextBase._isConnectionCreator
member.summary: Whether this context created a new DbConnection instance.

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.DeluxeDbContextBase.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
删除数据连接
the dispose process is varied according to whether a Current Transaction exists.

member.name: M:MCS.Library.Data.DeluxeDbContextBase.CreateConnection(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary:
创建一个连接
the connection retrieve process is as the following procedure:
if no transaction exists, this method create and return a new DbConnection instance
if transaction exists, this method should return a cached DbConnection instance
输出参数，返回连接是否创建成功 数据库连接名称

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.Data.Properties.Resource.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.Data.Properties.Resource.ArgumentNotNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 参数{0}不允许为空（Null Or Empty）。.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.Data.Properties.Resource.CanNotFindConnectionName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 不能找到数据库连接名称为{0}的配置信息，请检查connectionManager配置节.

member.name: P:MCS.Library.Data.Properties.Resource.CanNotFindProviderName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 不能找到数据库连接信息为"{0}"所对应的dataProvider:"{1}"，请检查connectionManager配置节的dataProviders配置项.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 字段{0}转换到属性{1}出错，{2}.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 在集合类型{0}中添加对象类型{1}时，Key属性值"{2}"重复.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oracle DB 中SQL语句多Table输出性能表现较差，故不支持输出多个TableName方法,如果需要查询返回多个DataTable请将其写成存储过程.
